title: Login as BOC Approver
custom_preconds:
(username/password: test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)

Given the user has navigated to the test url
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the correct credentials 
AND clicks Log In
custom_expected:
THEN the user will successfully log in 
AND the home dashboard will display

title: As BOC, I can navigate to a player's Service tab of his player profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user opens Major League Player's profile from the Roster widget whose Major League roster status is Active
AND BOC user opens the player's Service tab
custom_expected: THEN the page loads successfully without error

title: As Club Admin, I can navigate to a player's Service tab of his player profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN [C1127693] has been completed and passed
custom_steps:

AND Club Admin user opens the player's Service tab
custom_expected: THEN the page loads successfully without error

title: As BOC, I want to see a player's total MLS
custom_preconds: GIVEN [C1127688] has been completed and passed
custom_steps:
WHEN user adds the players **Opening Day MLS** and **Current Season Service** values together

*Major League Service is displayed as "XX.YYY"; "XX" is the full seasons year while "YYY" is the number of days towards next fulls season. A player earns a full season by accruing 172 days of Major League Service.  For example, "1.105" means that a player has one full year (172 days) plus 105 days of Major League Service.*
*XX will increment once YYY reaches 172, and YYY will go back to 0.  For example, if a player is at 1.171, the next value would be 2.000.*
custom_expected:
THEN this number equals **Total MLS** found in the Service Info section
AND this number also equals **Total MLS** found in the player header (to the right of the player's club)

title: As BOC, I can see a day by day breakdown of player's MJ service
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1124557] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user is still on the same active Major League player's Service tab
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user navigates to the player's Breakdown widget
custom_expected:
THEN the top row has today's date in the date column
AND the bottom row has the same date as the club's *First Game of Season* found in Club System Dates
AND the table has the following columns: Date, MJ Roster Status EOD, MN Roster Status EOD, Org EOD, Club EOD, MJ Service, Mnr Service, MJ day, Mnr Day, DL Day, Option Day, Outright Day, Foreign

*Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service*

title: As BOC, I want Major League service to be given to player automatically every night
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1124549] has been completed and passed
AND today's date is in season for major league clubs
AND BOC user is still on the same active Major League player's Service tab
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user navigates to the player's Breakdown widget
AND checks the row for today's date
custom_expected:
THEN the **MJ Service** column has a green check mark populated for that row
AND the **MJ Day** column for the that row is populated with the same number as **Current Season Service** (in the Major League Service section of Service Info)

title: As BOC, I want to see a player's service days with his current club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1124550] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user is still on the same active Major League player's Service tab
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user navigates to the player's Major League Summary widget
AND adds the **Days Towards 172** values from the top row and any previous rows until the **Club** changes to a different value


*Examples:*
*-If a player is on CLE in 2017 and 2016 and also was on NYY in 2016, only add the 2015 and 2016 rows for CLE.*
*-If a player is on ARI for 2017, 2016, and 2015 and was previously on HOU in 2014, 2013, and 2012 and MIN in 2011, only add the 2017, 2016, and 2015 rows for ARI.*
custom_expected: THEN this value equals the player's **Current Club MLS**

title: As BOC, I want the current year MJ service summary to get updated daily
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1124548] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user is still on the same active Major League player's Service tab
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user navigates to the Major League Summary table
AND BOC looks for the row(s) for the current season
custom_expected:
THEN the combined value for the **Total Season Service** column for rows in current season equals **Current Season Service** found in the Major League Service section of Service Info
AND the **Total MLS** column for the top row equals **Total MLS** found in the Major League Service section of Service Info
AND the **Days Towards 172** column does not exceed 172 for any rows in the table

title: As BOC, I want the Minor League Service to be given to player automatically every night
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has opened Minor League Player's profile from the Roster widget whose Minor League roster status is Active
AND BOC user has opened the player's Service tab
AND today's date is in season for his minor league club
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user navigates to the player's Breakdown widget
AND checks the row for today's date
custom_expected:
THEN the **Mnr Service** column has a green check mark populated for that row
AND the **Mnr Day** column for the that row is populated with the same number as **Current Season Service** (in the Minor League Service section of Service Info)

custom_expected:

title: Verify 'Designated for Assignment' MJ roster status is accruing Major League Service days if prior status was service accruing
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
AND today's date is in season major league clubs
AND BOC user has opened Major League Player's profile from the Roster widget whose Major League roster status is Active
AND BOC user creates a new Designated for Assignment transaction backdated 3 days including today's date 
AND BOC user approves the Designated for Assignment transaction
AND BOC user runs the Pro Roster Batch for the player via his Player ID in Update Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user navigates to the player's Breakdown widget on his Service tab
AND checks the row for today's date
custom_expected:
THEN the **MJ Service** column has a green check mark populated for that row
AND the **MJ Day** column for the that row is populated with the same number as **Current Season Service** (in the Major League Service section of Service Info)

title: Verify 'Designated for Assignment' MJ roster status is NOT accruing Major League Service days if prior status was NOT service accruing
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed advanced search for a player whose whose Major League roster status is *"Optioned"*
AND BOC user has opened player's profile
AND BOC user creates a new Designated for Assignment transaction backdated 3 days including today's date 
AND BOC user approves the Designated for Assignment transaction
AND BOC user runs the Pro Roster Batch for the player via his Player ID in Update Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user navigates to the player's Breakdown widget
AND checks the row for today's date
custom_expected:
THEN the **MJ Service** column DOES NOT have a green check mark populated for that row
AND the **MJ Day** column for the that row IS NOT populated with a number

title: As BOC, I want to see basic service info on the player profile (info from ebis 1)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed an advanced search for Derek Jeter
AND BOC user has opened Jeter's profile
AND BOC user has navigated to his Service tab

https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/service?playerId=51935
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user is verifying data in the Service Info section
custom_expected:
THEN **Total MLS** = 19.043
AND **Current Club MLS** = 0.0
AND **Opening Day MLS** = 19.043
AND **Current Season Service** (in Major League Service section) = 0 days
AND **Prior Season Service** = 0 days
AND **Super 2** = [blank]
AND **Rookie Milestone Crossed** = 05/01/1996
AND **3 Year** = Yes
AND **5 Year** = Yes
AND **6 Year** = Yes
AND **10/5 Year** = [blank]
AND **Minor Lg Contract Yrs** = 4
AND **Minor Lg Service Years** = 4
AND **Potential Minor Lg FA* = 4
AND **Minor Lg FA Yr** = 4
AND **Current Season Service** (in Minor League Service section) = 0 days
AND **Highest Level Of Play** = MAJ

title: As BOC, I want to know when a player reaches his 3 yr milestone
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed advanced search for Cole Gillespie (https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/history?playerId=335416)
AND BOC user has opened player's profile
AND BOC user has created a Major League contract dated 4/4 of current season for any Org
AND BOC user has taken the contract to Approved
AND BOC user navigates to the player's Player History
AND BOC user opens the Sign To Major League Roster transaction that was automatically created
AND BOC user approves the transaction, overriding any warnings
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user navigates to the player's Service tab on his player profile
custom_expected: THEN the **3 Year** milestone equals 5/12/XXXX (XXXX being the current year)

title: As BOC, I can see when player has or will cross his service milestone values
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed an advanced search for Albert Pujols
AND BOC user has opened Pujols' profile
AND BOC user has navigated to his Service tab
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user is verifying his *Milestones* section
custom_expected:
THEN his 3 yr Milestone is "Yes"
AND 5 yr is "Yes"
AND 6 yr is "Yes"
AND 10/5 yr date is "Yes"

*These say Yes because eBis 1 did not save these values as dates. Going forward eBis 2 will capture and store these values as dates*

title: As BOC, I want to project when a player will reach his milestones
custom_preconds:

AND BOC user has performed advanced search for Jason Bulger (https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/history?playerId=205707)
AND BOC user has opened player's profile
AND BOC user has created a Major League contract dated today for any Org
AND BOC user has taken the contract to Approved
AND BOC user navigates to the player's Player History
AND BOC user opens the Sign To Major League Roster transaction that was automatically created
AND BOC user approves the transaction, overriding any warnings

custom_expected:
THEN the **3 Year** milestone equals "Projected - MM/DD/YYYY" with the date being 12 days from today's date

*Example: If he signs on 07/14/2017, it would show as "Projected - 07/26/2017"*

Wire:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service

title: As BOC, I want player flagged a rookie until he has 45 Active roster days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
AND today's date is 5/16 or later in the current season
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user has performed advanced search for any domestic amateur player
AND BOC user has opened player's profile
AND BOC user creates and approves a minor contract for the player dated 4/1 of current year
AND BOC user creates and approves a major contract for the player dated 4/2 of current year
AND BOC user runs the Pro Roster Batch using this player's Pro player ID
AND BOC user navigates to the player's Service tab on his player profile
custom_expected:
THEN his **Rookie Milestone** equals 5/16/XXXX (XXXX being the current year)



*Note: Need to make a negative case for this where he doesn't cross rookie milestone*

title: As BOC, I want to calculate Option days for a player

AND BOC user has performed advanced search for a player whose whose Major League roster status is *"Optioned"*
AND BOC user has opened player's profile
AND BOC user has navigated to the player's Service tab
AND today's date is in season for major league clubs
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user navigates to the player's Breakdown widget
AND checks for the **Option Day** value for the row for today's date
AND BOC user navigates to the player's Waiver/Trans tab
AND checks the **Option Days - Current Season** value in the Options section
custom_expected: THEN the **Option Day** value on the Breakdown widget is the same as the **Option Days - Current Season** on the Waivers/Trans tab

title: As BOC, I want Option days to account for Post game assignments
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
AND today's date is in season major league clubs

AND BOC user creates a new Optional Assignment transaction dated today
AND BOC user checks Post Game Assignment checkbox in the transaction
AND BOC user approves the Optional Assignment transaction
AND BOC user runs the Pro Roster Batch for the player via his Player ID in Update Mode
custom_steps:

AND checks the row for today's date
custom_expected: THEN the **Option Day** column on the Breakdown widget for the top row is not populated (it should be blank)

title: As BOC, I do not want player to get an option day on the date he is recalled

AND BOC user runs the Pro Roster Batch for the player via his Player ID in Update Mode

AND checks the row closest to the top where ML Roster Status EOD = Designated for Assignment
custom_expected: THEN the **Option Day** column on the Breakdown widget for that same row is populated with a number (should not be blank)

title: As BOC, I want option days to account for DFA roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
AND today's date is in season major league clubs
AND BOC user has opened Major League Player's profile from the Roster widget whose Major League roster status is Active
AND BOC user creates a new Major/Minor Outright transaction backdated 3 days including today's date 
AND BOC user approves the Major/Minor Outright transaction
AND BOC user runs the Pro Roster Batch for the player via his Player ID in Update Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user navigates to the player's Breakdown widget on his Service tab
AND checks the row for today's date 
AND BOC user navigates to the Waivers/Trans tab of the player's profile
AND checks for the value of **Outright Days - Current Season** in the Outrights Section


**AC**
- If player's roster status is DFA, then look at his previous roster status. If his previous status was Optioned, then all DFA days also count as Option days
custom_expected: THEN the **Outright Day** value on the Breakdown widget is the same as the **Outright Days - Current Season** on the Waivers/Trans tab

title: As BOC, I want to calculate DL days for a player

AND BOC user has opened player's profile
AND BOC user has navigated to the player's Service tab
AND today's date is in season for major league clubs
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user navigates to the player's Breakdown widget
AND checks for the *DL Day* value for the row for today's date
AND BOC user navigates to the player's Waiver/Trans tab
AND checks the **Days on DL - Current Season** value in the Disabled List section

*Statuses that count as DL Days:
7 Day Concussion DL,
Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL,
15 Day DL,
Rehab 15 Day DL,
60 Day DL,
Rehab 60 Day DL*
custom_expected: THEN the **DL Day** value on the Breakdown widget is the same as the **Days on DL - Current Season** on the Waivers/Trans tab

title: As BOC, I want to manually add a year to MJ Summary
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed an advanced search for Derek Jeter
AND BOC user has opened Jeter's profile
AND BOC user has navigated to his Service tab
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user navigates to the Major League Summary widget
AND BOC user clicks the Add Row button in the bottom right corner
AND BOC user clicks the pencil icon in the newly created row on top of the widget
AND BOC user chooses 2015 from the Year dropdown
AND BOC user chooses ARI from the Club dropdown
AND BOC user enters 172 into the Days w Club column
AND BOC user clicks the Save button at the bottom of the widget
custom_expected:
THEN when the page reloads the new row is visible in the Major League Summary widget 
AND the values in the new (top) row are as follows:
Year = 2015
Club = ARI
Days w Club = 172
Adjustments = 172
Total MLS = 20.043


NOTE: Need to add a negative case to this suite for this clubs where they can't edit

title: Player who has service accruing status after Org change
custom_preconds: GIVEN [C1127688] has been completed and passed
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user creates and approves a trade transaction for the player's who profile is open
AND BOC user runs the Pro Roster Batch for the player 
AND BOC navigates to the Breakdown widget on the Service tab of the player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN **Org EOD** for the top row equals the 'To Org' from the trade transaction
AND the **MJ Service** column has a green check mark populated for the top row

title: Player who has non-accruing roster status after Org change, but had a roster accruing status before Org change
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127692] has been completed and passed
AND today's date is in season major league clubs
AND BOC user has performed advanced search for a player whose whose Major League roster status is "Optioned"
AND BOC user has opened player's profile
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user creates and approves a trade transaction for the player's who profile is open
AND BOC user runs the Pro Roster Batch for the player 
AND BOC navigates to the Breakdown widget on the Service tab of the player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN **Org EOD** for the top row equals the 'From Org' from the trade transaction
AND the **MJ Service** column has a green check mark populated for the top row


*Note: Player gets Service because Optioned players get an automatic recall to majors after a trade they're involved in is approved.*
